# Swimming
## Overview
**Aura** faint transmutation; **CL** 2nd

**Slot** ring

**Price** 2,500 gp

**Weight** â€”

**Description**

This silver ring usually has fish-like designs and motifs etched into the band. It continually grants the wearer a +5 competence bonus on [[Swim (Skill)|Swim]] checks.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Forge Ring (Feat)|Forge Ring]], creator must have 5 ranks in the [[Swim (Skill)|Swim]] skill

**Cost** 1,250 gp

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 483
